channel.title: 2019s on happenings by Sam Hamilton
channel.description: Recent content in 2019s on happenings by Sam Hamilton

item.title: Pat Griskus Olympic
item.description: Details Date: June 15, 2019 Location: Middlebury, CT Times Swim: 0:29:18 Bike: 1:14:13 Run: 0:41:57 Total: 2:29:49 Results 2⁄28 Age Group | 17⁄203 overall Thoughts Overall This race replaced the Rev3 Quassy Olympic on my race calendar and boy was it a fun race. The energy amongst the athletes was more friendly than any other race I’d ever done. The organizers, volunteers, and athletes were all on the same page and it showed.

item.title: Harvest Triathlon
item.description: Details Date: June 8, 2019 Location: Wareham, MA Times Swim: 0:25:18 Bike: 1:21:02 Bike (29 miles) Run: 0:46:52 Total: 2:36:31 Results 2⁄11 Age Group | 24⁄196 overall Thoughts Overall The Max Performance Harvest Triathlon in Wareham, MA was very well run race in a beautiful town at the base of Cape Cod. It featured a straight-forward lake swim, a bike course that was longer than most Intermediate distance triathlons at 29 miles, and a challenging run.
